snippet: A suicide bomber killed at least 51 Shiite pilgrims crossing a bridge in Baghdad, the police said, in the deadliest of several attacks in Iraq. All told, at least 80 were killed, officials said.
abstract: At least 80 people are killed in one day of attacks in Iraq, including 51 Shiite pilgrims killed by suicide bomber while crossing bridge in Baghdad.

byline.contributor: Yasir Ghazi contributed reporting from Baghdad, and employees of The New York Times from Baghdad and Mosul, Iraq.

lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber killed at least 51 Shiite pilgrims crossing a bridge in Baghdad, the police said, in the deadliest of several attacks in Iraq. All told, at least 80 were killed, officials said.

headline.main: Scores Are Killed in Iraqi Violence
headline.print_headline: Attacks Leave At Least 80 Dead in Iraq
